arts.sum: Barcelona will take on Newcastle United in their first Champions League group stage clash of this season at St James’ Park on Thursday. Hansi Flick will be without his star, Lamine Yamal, for the key clash against Newcastle as the 18-year-old is forced out due to an injury.
